sect2.title: Installation of rsync
sect2.para: For security reasons, running the rsync server as an unprivileged user and group is encouraged. Create the rsyncd user and group with the following commands:

userinput.command: groupadd rsyncd && useradd -c rsyncd -d /home/rsync -g rsyncd -s /bin/false rsyncd
